net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller

Class MarshallingTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller.MarshallingTools

  • public class MarshallingTools
extends Object
    A collection of static methods to facilitate the reading and writing of Waters documents from and to files.
    Author:
    Robi Malik

    • Method Detail

      • saveProductDES

        public static void saveProductDES(ProductDESProxy des,
                                  String filename)
        Saves a product DES as a product DES (.wdes) file.
        Parameters:
        des - The product DES to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wdes extension.

      • saveProductDES

        public static void saveProductDES(AutomatonProxy aut,
                                  String filename)
        Saves an automaton into a product DES (.wdes) file. This methods creates a product DES containing the events of the given automaton and the automaton, and saves it into a file.
        Parameters:
        aut - The automaton to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wdes extension.

      • saveProductDES

        public static void saveProductDES(Collection<? extends AutomatonProxy> automata,
                                  String filename)
        Saves a collection of automata into a product DES (.wdes) file. This methods creates a product DES containing the events of the given automata and the automata, and saves it into a file.
        Parameters:
        automata - The automata to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wdes extension.

      • saveModule

        public static void saveModule(ModuleProxy module,
                              String filename)
        Saves a module as a Waters module (.wmod) file.
        Parameters:
        module - The module to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wmod extension.

      • saveModule

        public static void saveModule(ProductDESProxy des,
                              String filename)
        Saves a product DES as a Waters module (.wmod) file. This method converts the given product into a module and saves the result to a file.
        Parameters:
        des - The product DES to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wmod extension.

      • saveModule

        public static void saveModule(AutomatonProxy aut,
                              String filename)
        Saves an automaton into a Waters module (.wmod) file. This methods creates a module containing the events of the given automaton and the automaton, and saves it into a file.
        Parameters:
        aut - The automaton to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wmod extension.

      • saveModule

        public static void saveModule(Collection<? extends AutomatonProxy> automata,
                              String filename)
        Saves a collection of automata into a Waters module (.wmod) file. This methods creates a product DES containing the events of the given automata and the automata, and saves it into a file.
        Parameters:
        automata - The automata to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file, should have .wmod extension.

      • saveProductDESorModule

        public static void saveProductDESorModule(ProductDESProxy des,
                                          String filename)
        Saves a product DES as a product DES (.wdes) or module (.wmod) file, depending on the extension found in the file name.
        Parameters:
        des - The product DES to be saved.
        filename - The name of the output file. If no extension is present, .wdes is added.

      • loadModule

        public static ModuleProxy loadModule(String filename)
        Loads a module from the a file. This is a convenience method to read a module from a file without a DocumentManager. The module is loaded directly and created using a ModuleElementFactory.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to load (typically with .wmod extension).

      • loadAndCompileModule

        public static ProductDESProxy loadAndCompileModule(String filename)
        Loads a module from the a file and compiles it to a product DES. This is a convenience method to read and compile a module without instantiating a DocumentManager or ModuleCompiler.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to load (typically with .wmod extension).

      • loadProductDES

        public static ProductDESProxy loadProductDES(String filename)
        Loads a product DES from the a file. This is a convenience method to read a product DES from a file without a DocumentManager. The module is loaded directly and created using a ProductDESElementFactory.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to load (typically with .wdes extension).
